downloadTitle: Microsoft IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 Management Pack for MOM 2005
downloadDescription: Microsoft IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 Management Pack monitors IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 services and their availability.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 MOM 2005 MP.msi

detailsSection:
Microsoft Internet Protocol Television (IPTV) Well Enabled Services (WES) Adapter 3.0 Management Pack for MOM monitors the IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 services application event log. This management pack is build for monitoring both IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 Web and Windows services generated events. It includes event rules for the IPTV Adapter Poller and IPTV Usage Event Monitor windows services and IPTV WES Adapter web service. The events collected from each individual service indicate critical issues, informational events and error events generated during various IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 configurations and process flows. In addition different monitoring and corrective tasks allows detection and curing of service outages.

Feature Summary:

IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 services generated Error and Informational events.
IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 service monitoring events indicating services health status.
Alerts indicating configuration issues for services
State monitoring view for various component services health status
Tasks to facilitate monitoring and control IPTV WES Adapter 3.0 services
Notification if windows services outrage

Release and Update History:

7/14/2006 Original product release date (Version 03.0.0000.0000)
